How do you specify a random address to source all funds for fees when using Verus?
You don't specify a random address. Instead, you can use a transparent or private address to source all funds for fees, which helps to preserve the privacy of the identity.

ansparent or private address to source all funds for fees to preserve privacy of the identity
```
#### Result:
transactionid          (hexstr)
What is the format of the transaction ID returned by Verus?
The transaction ID returned by Verus is a hexadecimal string (hexstr).

ansparent or private address to source all funds for fees to preserve privacy of the identity
```
#### Result:
transactionid          (hexstr)
